value.title: Speech recognition technology is racist, study finds
value.excerpt: New evidence of voice recognition’s racial bias problem has emerged. Speech recognition technologies developed by Amazon, Google, Apple, Microsoft, and IBM make almost twice as many errors when transcribing African American voices as they do with white American voices, according to a new Stanford study. value.title: Speech recognition systems have higher error rates for black people, study finds
value.excerpt: This is far from the first time we've seen evidence of bias embedded in the supposed technology of tomorrow.
